name: Clever Coding
tagline: Turning Mobile App ideas into reality.
description:
We develop apps for iPhone, iPad, Mac, Android and the Web for ourselves and clients around the world. We are based out of Lehi, Utah. Our goal is to help you turn your mobile app idea into a reality. We have helped develop hundreds of apps for the iPhone,iPad, Mac, Android and the Web. Many have been top 100 apps and many featured by Apple. Our app Paper Pilot made it as high as the #2 app during a free promotion we ran with freeappaday.com.
Our own company apps have been download over 4 million times and counting. We have been doing 100% mobile & web development since 2008. When you hire us to develop your apps you are getting one of the most experienced teams you can find anywhere. Visit our company website to find out more and to contact us today.
